STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Build.Label: Build
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Coordination.Label: Coordination
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Wits.Label: Wits
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Wits.Summary: Willpower, quick thinking, and ability to act under pressure.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Acuity.Label: Acuity
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Acuity.Summary: Curiosity, ability to learn, and overall knowledge.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Empathy.Label: Empathy
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Empathy.Summary: Ability to understand and relate to another person, and ability to wield empathetic psychic powers.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Potency.Label: Potency
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Potency.Summary: General strength of psychic powers, and overall strength of personality.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Luck.Label: Luck
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Statistics.Luck.Summary: How much the universe favours the character. Used for re-rolls, surviving death, and other lucky breaks. Luck caps out at 50.

STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Assets.Label: Assets
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Assets.GeneralDescription: An abstract measurement of a character's finances. Allocated to equipment maintenance, and spent on augments. Player characters start with 11 Assets.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Assets.PlayerDecription: An abstract measurement of your finances. Allocated to equipment maintenance, and spent on augments. Player characters start with 11 Assets.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Capacity.Label: Carry Capacity
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Capacity.GeneralDescription: How much mass a character can carry without being over-burdened.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Capacity.PlayerDescription: How much mass you can carry without being over-burdened.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Charges.Label: Charges
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Charges.GeneralDescription: The amount of charges a character has to spend on psychic power use.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Charges.PlayerDescription: The amount of charges you have to spend on psychic power use.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Charisma.Label: Charisma
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Health.Label: Health
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Health.GeneralDescription: How much physical damage a character can take before they start receiving injuries.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Health.PlayerDescription: How much physical damage you can take before you start receiving injuries.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Influence.Label: Influence
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Influence.GeneralDescription: The level of fame and clout a character has. A character's reputation can preceed them, and cannot go away unless they appear dead or retired.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Influence.PlayerDescription: Your level of fame and clout. Your reputation can preceed you, and cannot go away unless you appear dead or retired.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Ingenuity.Label: Ingenuity
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Intensity.Label: Intensity
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Nerve.Label: Nerve
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Nerve.GeneralDescription: How much mental strain a character can suffer before they start receiving mental injuries.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Nerve.PlayerDescription: How much mental strain you can suffer before you start receiving mental injuries.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Resilience.Label: Resilience
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Resolve.Label: Resolve
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Resolve.GeneralDescription: The amount of nerve breaks a character can take before they fall apart.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Resolve.PlayerDescription: The amount of nerve breaks you can take before you fall apart.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Speed.Label: Speed
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Stamina.Label: Stamina
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Stamina.GeneralDescription: How much a character can physically exert themselves before suffering injuries from over-exertion.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Stamina.PlayerDescription: How much you can physically exert yourself before suffering injuries from over-exertion.
STARLIGHT_JOURNALS.Attributes.Strength.Label: Strength

Acrobatics.Label: Acrobatics
Acrobatics.Summary: Quick and flexible movement, dodging attacks, performing contortionist feats, and avoiding physical obstacles with grace.
Acrobatics.AltStatistics.Build: Build can be used in situations like climbing or vaulting where upper body strength can be leveraged.

AEFab.Label: Advanced Energy Fabrication
AEFab.Summary: To produce, use, and deconstruct high technology devices, primarily relying on advanced physics concepts like n-space. Aids in identification of such devices.
AEFab.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used when performing salvage and repair.

AnimalHandling.Label: Animal Handling
AnimalHandling.Summary: To control, tame, and pacify animals. Also covers the command of bio-drone devices as well as normal animals, as well as control of a tamed animal mount.
AnimalHandling.AltStatistics.Acuity: Acuity can be used when providing care to a creature or attempting to pacify a well known animal, but takes a -20 when attempting to interact.
AnimalHandling.AltStatistics.Potency: Potency can be used to intimidate an animal, though this receives a modifier based on your size versus the animal’s size.

Antiquarian.Label: Antiquarian
Antiquarian.Summary: Historical facts, archaeological skill, and skill with languages. Also covers appraising and understanding ancient artifacts.
Antiquarian.AltStatistics.Empathy: Empathy can be used instead of Acuity to understand cultural artifacts and history.

Athletics.Label: Athletics
Athletics.Summary: To endure long, strenuous activities like swimming, climbing, long runs, and the use of bow and crossbow style weapons. Can be used when using thrown weapons of any type.
Athletics.AltStatistics.Coordination: Coordination can be used instead of Build when making quick sprints or quickly swimming.

BioFab.Label: Bio-fabrication
BioFab.Summary: To produce, use, and deconstruct bio-tech devices. This includes bio-drones, genetically modified entities, and medical drugs.
BioFab.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used when performing repairs or salvage.

Chemistry.Label: Chemistry
Chemistry.Summary: To identify and use chemicals. Can be used for performing forensics and salvaging tasks.
Chemistry.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used in the place of Acuity when trying to do forensics quickly, but you take a -30 for the substitution.

Composure.Label: Composure
Composure.Summary: To resist social pressure and remain invisible in a crowd. Prevent others from reading your emotions and thoughts, even when you’re not trying to deceive.
Composure.AltStatistics.Potency: Potency can be used where you can justify cowing the other party out of their point instead of politely ignoring it.

Control.Label: Control
Control.Summary: To control psychic energy and siphon energy when needed. Can be used to exert your will over void wraiths and other n-space formed entities.
Control.AltStatistics.Empathy: Empathy can be used if you negotiate with, rather than overpower, a void wraith or other n-space entity like an Echo.

Cooking.Label: Cooking
Cooking.Summary: To turn raw food into delicious and appetizing meals. This includes many different human and alien techniques in the conversion.
Cooking.AltStatistics.Acuity: Acuity can be used if you are using a proper kitchen and are able to refer to a recipe during its creation.

CQC.Label: CQC
CQC.Summary: To use unarmed techniques, wrestling skills, and improvised weapons. The professional art of the use of swords, maces, and other long one-handed weapons.
CQC.AltStatistics.Coordination: Coordination can be used in the place of Build when using melee weapons and wrestling.

Deception.Label: Deception
Deception.Summary: To provide falsehoods, create convincing tales, and keep your words and your facts separate. To help create false personalities as well.
Deception.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used if you’re in a stressful situation and put on the spot to sell a lie. It can also be used if you want to blather through the lie with speed rather than be fully convincing.

Determination.Label: Determination
Determination.Summary: To resist fear, pain, and psychic powers targeting one’s mind. To push through mental damage, no matter what is telling you not to.
Determination.AltStatistics.Potency: Potency can be used when attacked by psychic powers.

Endurance.Label: Endurance
Endurance.Summary: To resist poisons, cold, and the heat. To push through what the physical world might throw at you, including psychic powers targeting one’s body.
Endurance.AltStatistics.Potency: You can use Potency to resist physical psychic attacks.

Energetics.Label: Energetics
Energetics.Summary: To control electrical systems, manage shield systems, and keep out parasitic programs from starships and armor systems alike. Used for resisting hacking and e/m effects.
Energetics.AltStatistics.Acuity: When not in a stressful situation, you can use Acuity instead of Wits.

Finesse.Label: Finesse
Finesse.Summary: To use weapons requiring more dexterity and leverage, like smaller knives and larger, longer weapons like staves.
Finesse.AltStatistics.Build: Build can be used instead of Coordination at any time.

FirstAid.Label: First Aid
FirstAid.Summary: To use field aid, field medicines, and administer aid rapidly when required. Handle medical emergencies with the care and grace needed.
FirstAid.AltStatistics.Acuity: In non-stressful situations, Acuity can be utilized instead.

HeavyGuns.Label: Heavy Guns
HeavyGuns.Summary: To use large ranged weapons like machine guns and rocket launchers, as well as their more scientifically advanced kin. Also covers clearing jams and maintaining them.
HeavyGuns.AltStatistics.Coordination: Coordination can be used in the place of Build at any time.

HeavyMelee.Label: Heavy Melee
HeavyMelee.Summary: To use large melee weapons, primarily the heavier, around 3-5 kg, two handed weapons. Also covers any absurdly over sized weapons that are dubbed as Extreme.

Inquiry.Label: Inquiry
Inquiry.Summary: To see through lies, track down the truth among a crowd’s statements, and to find people in social settings. It is also used to acquire items and ask pointed questions.
Inquiry.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used instead of Empathy, but results in a much more forceful context that can be off-putting or counterproductive.

Interlacing.Label: Interlacing
Interlacing.Summary: To weave the different layers of reality together to produce fascinating effects. Used primarily with psychic powers, especially gates and those that buff yourself.
Interlacing.AltStatistics.Acuity: You can use Acuity instead of Potency when out of combat, even when using psychic powers.

Intimidation.Label: Intimidation
Intimidation.Summary: To coerce with threats, either physical or social such as blackmail. Can be used to cow the will of enemies and cajole less stalwart allies.
Intimidation.AltStatistics.Wits: Build can be used in situations where physical strength can be applied to intimidation.

Knowledge.Label: Knowledge
Knowledge.Summary: To know things in both a general and specific sense. These are things your character already knows or at least knows how to understand more.

LongArms.Label: Long-arms
LongArms.Summary: To use various two handed rifle style weapons. This includes assault rifles, sniper rifles, marksman rifles, and shorter launchers. Can be used for Crossbow style weapons as well. Covers maintenance for these weapons.
LongArms.AltStatistics.Build: You may use Build at any point if preferred.

Magnetism.Label: Magnetism
Magnetism.Summary: To charm, attract, and exert willing authority over people. Often an inspiring person has strong magnetism.
Magnetism.AltStatistics.Wits: When exerting authority, you can use Wits instead of Empathy.

MechFab.Label: Mechanical Fabrication
MechFab.Summary: To fabricate and modify items based on standard engineering principles and deconstruct the vast majority of technology. Used when applying structural engineering principles
MechFab.AltStatistics.Wits: When performing medicine under stress, you can use Wits instead at a -20.

Medicine.Label: Medicine
Medicine.Summary: To perform long term care, perform surgeries, and use advanced medical devices. Covers the dosing of medicines. Can be upgraded with talents to allow crafting medicines and drugs
Medicine.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used when performing salvage or repairs at a workbench.

Navigation.Label: Navigation
Navigation.Summary: To plot a route, find oneself in space, orient in an unknown locale, and utilize navigational equipment such as maps and nav-computers.
Navigation.AltStatistics.Coordination: When using dead reckoning or an innate sense of direction, Coordination can be used instead.

Perception.Label: Perception
Perception.Summary: To find hidden people and things, to spot the unseen, or search for difficult to find items. It is also used when perceiving things with all of your senses, including tasting for poison or sensing oddities in gravity via kinesthetic senses.
Perception.AltStatistics.Coordination: Coordination can be freely used in the place of Wits for perception.

Performance.Label: Performance
Performance.Summary: To use instruments, dance, and sing. To understand the methods to create performances and understand what other people’s creations.
Performance.AltStatistics.Coordination: If your performance style focuses more on physical prowess than sheer entertainment, Coordination can be used.

Persuasion.Label: Persuasion
Persuasion.Summary: To convince people using their personality, reasonable reasons, and appeal without falsehood. To have a pleasant personality and know how to make conversation.
Persuasion.AltStatistics.Acuity: Acuity can be used when building disposition with shop-talk rather than small talk.

Piloting.Label: Piloting
Piloting.Summary: To pilot, to drive, to operate. If a vehicle or mount requires direct operation, it is covered under this skill in its use.
Piloting.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used when piloting anything other than Superheavy Suits, Assault Suits, and Vehicles with the Quick special.

Programming.Label: Programming
Programming.Summary: To perform cryptography, to create and use programs, and to perform hacks. Also covers a wide array of other comp-sci and infosec information
Programming.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used when performing combat hacking.

PsiTechFab.Label: Psi-tech Fabrication
PsiTechFab.Summary: To construct, understand, and salvage psi-tech devices. To command and control psi-tech drones and shards while giving them some independence.
PsiTechFab.AltStatistics.Acuity: You can use Acuity instead of Potency at any point.

Repair.Label: Repair
Repair.Summary: To quickly repair or salvage devices of any type. This includes all forms of fabrication rather than being specific to each. Including bio-tech.
Repair.AltStatistics.Acuity: Acuity can be used when not under a time crunch.

Research.Label: Research
Research.Summary: To sort through the data, perform exhaustive searches, and prepare data in a presentable form. Data science understanding is primarily under this skill.
Research.AltStatistics.Empathy: If your data source is a person, Empathy can be used instead.

Scanning.Label: Scanning
Scanning.Summary: To use scanning devices, to understand scanned data, and understand complicated, unfiltered scientific data. Includes personal and starship scanners both.
Scanning.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used in stressful situation at a -20 mod.

Security.Label: Security
Security.Summary: To understand and break through mechanical locks, either silently or loudly. Can also be used to deploy lateral thinking to go around locks rather than deal with them.
Security.AltStatistics.Coordination: Coordination can be used if the test is made quietly and requires skillful fingers.

Sidearms.Label: Sidearms
Sidearms.Summary: To use pistols and PDWs, as well as maintain those weapons.

Stealth.Label: Stealth
Stealth.Summary: To move silently, remain out of sight, and shadow targets. To understand others enough to know how to avoid them and slip away from notice.
Stealth.AltStatistics.Wits: Wits can be used to hide in crowds and wellpopulated urban areas.

Survival.Label: Survival
Survival.Summary: To track through the wilderness, to forage and hunt, to setup good camps, and perform primitive camps.
Survival.AltStatistics.Coordination: Coordination can be used instead at any time.

Telekinesis.Label: Telekinesis
Telekinesis.Summary: To manipulate generated energy and matter for use. To move matter at will. This is used primarily for psychic powers.
Telekinesis.AltStatistics.Build: If the telekinesis is touch range, Build can be used instead of Potency.

Telepathy.Label: Telepathy
Telepathy.Summary: To reach through n-space to achieve a direct connection between animas for communication. Can be used for good or ill. Primarily used for psychic powers.
Telepathy.AltStatistics.Wits: When using telepathy, can use Wits at a -20. If you have the Force of Will talent, the -20 is removed.

Trades.Label: Trades
Trades.Summary: Unlisted skills that would still be reasonable to know like smithing, farming, law, or the like. Every pip in a Trade gives +20 to the test.

Trickery.Label: Trickery
Trickery.Summary: To pickpocket, perform feats of illusion, and perform feats like juggling. To perform feats of physical misdirection.
Trickery.AltStatistics.Wits: If relying on misdirection rather than quick hands, you can use Wits instead.

Xenology.Label: Xenology
Xenology.Summary: To perform studies on flora and fauna, come to understand unknown biology. Can be used for foraging after you have an understanding of the local ecology.
